channel.title: My Awesome Blog
channel.description: Recent content on My Awesome Blog

item.title: Welcome to My Blog
item.description:
Hello World!

This is my first blog post using Hugo.

What I learned today:

  • Hugo converts Markdown to HTML
  • Themes provide the design
  • The draft: false makes posts visible

This text is bold and this is italic.

Here’s a list:

  • Item 1
  • Item 2
  • Item 3
